secText:
Lesson:
1. Define a piecewise function. (Functions, graphing and volume Lesson 1.2)
2. Graph a piecewise function. (Functions, graphing and volume Lesson 1.2)
3. Define absolute value function. (Functions, graphing and volume Lesson 1.3)
4. Graph an absolute value function. (Functions, graphing and volume Lesson 1.3)
5. Define a quadratic function. (Functions, graphing and volume Lesson 1.4)
6. Graph a parabolic function. (Functions, graphing and volume Lesson 1.4)

In-class assessment:
1. Graph the function f(x) = x2 when x > 0 and f(x) = 2x − 1 when x is 0 or negative.
2. Graph y = 2x2 + 3.
